instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850-A No green light on charger
threads.message: I have PP3V42_G3H also i have SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC i also have 3.4v on the data line System one wire but still no green light. I think i have BAD SMC . Any ideas. Thanks

threads.title: 820-2850-A No green light on charger
threads.message: Remove keyboard and BIL and try again......

threads.title: 820-2850-A No green light on charger
threads.message: I'm working on a board only nothing is attached besides ram fan and magsafe

threads.title: 820-2850-A No green light on charger
threads.message: Use known good magsafe board and check SMC_RESET is high.

threads.title: 820-2850-A No green light on charger
threads.message: Pin 1 of U5000 I'm getting 3.4V what is the right voltage for SMC_RESET_L?
